channel.title: Why isn't it adding the element!
channel.description: Ok.. hopefully this is my last post about this chat server I'm making, because this is the last problem I'm having. I'm getting frustrated as hell because it won't accept multiple vectors or SOMETHING, something is fucked up with the vectors in ChatHandler. If someone could help me.. thanks.

item.title: Why isn't it adding the element!
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

Ahh! Thanks a ton!

Read full topic
item.source: Why isn't it adding the element!

item.title: Why isn't it adding the element!
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

What you are doing now is creating multiple threads, and in within each thread you add a vector, which you fill with the current instance, causing it to only have one element. Each vector is different, because each thread is a different object. You need to globalize the vector by putting it in the ChatServer class.

Read full topic
item.source: Why isn't it adding the element!
